text: Dong Young-bae (), also known as Taeyang, Yoo Tae-yang or SOL, is a South Korean singer. He joined in 2006 as a member of a K-pop boy band called BigBang. Category:1988 births Category:BigBang (South Korean band) Category:K-pop singers Category:Living people Category:South Korean singers Category:South Korean television actors Category:YG Entertainment artists
title: Taeyang
